text: FXX is a Greek pay television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA. The channel was originally launched as the Greek version of BBC World News on 6 May 2010 but was replaced by the Greek version of Discovery Home & Health on 6 March 2013. The channel started broadcasting in 16:9 aspect ratio on 6 October 2013. On 28 July 2023, Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA announced that the Greek version of Discovery Home & Health would be relaunched as FXX on 20 August 2023. == Logos == file:BBC World News 2019.svg|6 May 2010-6 March 2013 file:Discovery H&H.png;|6 March 2013-20 August 2023 file:FXX Logo.svg|20 August 2023-present Category:Television channels in Europe
title: FXX (Greek TV channel)
